table.name: uommap
table.description: This table stores the conversion/ map from one Unit of Measure to another Unit Of Measure. For example: For Length the Meter To Feet conversion is  3.2808399, Meter to Yard is 1.0936133 etc.

columns.name: TYPE
columns.description: TYPE contains the type for the unit of measure for localization. Examples include: DISTANCE DURATION LENGTH SPEED TEMPERATURE VOLUME WEIGHT

columns.name: FROM_UOM_CODE
columns.description: FROM_UOM_CODE contains an abbreviated name for the original unit of measure being converted.

columns.name: TO_UOM_CODE
columns.description: TO_UOM_CODE contains an abbreviated name for the unit of measure to which another unit of measure is being converted.

columns.name: CONVERSION_CLASS
columns.description: CONVERSION_CLASS contains the Java class name that is used to convert a temperature from one unit of measure to another. The  units of measure include Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin.

columns.name: CONVERSION_FACTOR
columns.description: CONVERSION_FACTOR contains the mathematical factors for converting one unit of measure to another.
